revisions.rev:
{{NCAATeamFootballSeason |Year=1996 |Team=Wyoming Cowboys |Image= U Wyoming logo.jpg |ImageSize = 125 |Conference=Western Athletic Conference |Division= Pacific |ShortConference=WAC |Record=10-2 |ConfRecord= 7-1 |CoachRank=22 |APRank=22 |HeadCoach=[[Joe Tiller]] |OffCoach= |DefCoach= |OScheme= |DScheme= |Stadium=[[War Memorial Stadium (Wyoming)|War Memorial Stadium]] |Champion= |BowlTourney= |BowlTourneyResult= }} {{1996 WAC football standings}} The '''1996 Wyoming Cowboys football team''' represented the [[University of Wyoming]] in the 1996 NCAA football season. The Cowboys offense scored 464 points while the defense allowed 284 points. Led by head coach Joe Tiller, the Cowboys finished the season with ten wins.
